mapper.select: SELECT MASTER_PK, MASTER_NM, MASTER_USERNAME, MASTER_PW, MASTER_EMAIL, MASTER_PNUMBER, MASTER_ADDRESS, MASTER_BDATE FROM MASTER_TEST
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO master_test(MASTER_PK, MASTER_NM, MASTER_USERNAME, MASTER_PW, MASTER_EMAIL, MASTER_PNUMBER, MASTER_ADDRESS, MASTER_BDATE) VALUES(master_pk_seq.nextval, #{master_nm}, #{master_username}, #{master_pw}, #{master_email}, #{master_pnumber}, #{master_address}, #{master_bdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE MASTER_TEST SET MASTER_NM = #{master_nm}, MASTER_USERNAME = #{master_username}, MASTER_PW = #{master_pw}, MASTER_EMAIL = #{master_email}, MASTER_PNUMBER = #{master_pnumber}, MASTER_ADDRESS = #{master_address}, MASTER_BDATE = #{master_bdate} WHERE MASTER_PK = #{master_pk}
